titleStmt.title: A vindication of The case of indifferent things used in the worship of God in answer to a book intituled The case of indifferent things used in the worship of God, examined, stated on the behalf of the dissenters and calmly argued.
titleStmt.author: Williams, John, 1636?-1709.

titleStmt.title: A vindication of The case of indifferent things used in the worship of God in answer to a book intituled The case of indifferent things used in the worship of God, examined, stated on the behalf of the dissenters and calmly argued.
titleStmt.author: Williams, John, 1636?-1709.
Bagshaw, Edward, 1629-1671.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by H. Hills, for Fincham Gardner ...,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to John Williams. Cf. DNB.
Attributed also to Edward Bagshaw. Cf. Halkett and Laing.
This work also appears, on reel 528:1, as the seventh item in v. 1 of: A collection of cases and other discourses / by some divines of the city of London (Wing C5114) .
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
